abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: Creates a wall of fire that blocks vision and heals Phoenix when standing inside it
abilities.description: Phoenix creates a wall of fire that blocks vision and heals him if he stands inside it.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.effect: Throws a flashbang around a corner to blind enemies
abilities.description: Phoenix throws a flashbang that curves around corners, blinding any enemies in its radius.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.effect: Heals Phoenix or damages enemies in an area
abilities.description: Phoenix throws a molotov that heals him if he is in the area, or damages enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.effect: Marks a location and respawns Phoenix there if he dies
abilities.description: Phoenix marks a spot on the map. If he dies while this ability is active, he respawns at the marked location.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.effect: Throws a projectile that bursts into a cloud of smoke
abilities.description: Jett throws a projectile that bursts into a cloud of smoke, blocking vision.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.effect: Propels Jett upward
abilities.description: Jett uses wind to propel herself upward, allowing for vertical mobility.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.effect: After getting a kill, Jett dashes in the direction she's moving
abilities.description: Jett can dash quickly in the direction she’s moving after getting a kill.

abilities.name: Tailwind (Ultimate)
abilities.effect: Jett dashes quickly in the direction she’s moving
abilities.description: Jett dashes very fast for a short period, and the ability is reset after getting a kill.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.effect: Deploys a large wall that can be used to block enemies or protect teammates.
abilities.description: Sage deploys a large wall that can be rotated and placed in various positions. It blocks enemy movement and vision.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.effect: Creates a sphere that slows enemies who step inside.
abilities.description: Sage throws a slow orb that creates an area where enemies' movement is drastically slowed down.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.effect: Heals teammates or herself over time.
abilities.description: Sage can heal herself or a teammate by using the Healing Orb, restoring a portion of health over time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.effect: Revives a dead teammate.
abilities.description: Sage can bring a dead teammate back to life, restoring them to full health. This ultimate has a long cooldown but can turn the tide of the game.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.effect: Throws a sphere that nearsights enemies in its path.
abilities.description: Reyna throws a blind sphere that nearsights enemies, making them unable to see anything beyond it.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.effect: Teleports a short distance.
abilities.description: Reyna can teleport a short distance in the direction she is moving, allowing her to reposition quickly and dodge enemy fire.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: Heals herself by consuming a soul orb dropped by a killed enemy.
abilities.description: After killing an enemy, Reyna can use the soul orb to instantly heal herself or gain movement speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.effect: Boosts fire rate and enables automatic use of Devour.
abilities.description: Reyna enters a state of heightened awareness, increasing her fire rate and allowing her to automatically use Devour without the need to press any buttons.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.effect: Teleports a short distance to a nearby location.
abilities.description: Omen can teleport a short distance to any location in his line of sight. This ability is useful for repositioning or escaping tricky situations.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.effect: Sends out a shadowy projectile that blinds and deafens enemies in its path.
abilities.description: Omen casts a shadowy projectile that travels through walls, blinding and deafening any enemies it touches.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.effect: Creates a floating orb that can be placed anywhere on the map to block vision.
abilities.description: Omen deploys a floating orb that can be placed anywhere on the map to block vision. The orb can be controlled and moved while it is in flight.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.effect: Ultimate ability that allows Omen to teleport anywhere on the map.
abilities.description: Omen can teleport anywhere on the map, but his position is revealed to the enemies before he arrives. A highly strategic ability for gathering information or setting up surprise attacks.
